Tasks.Caption: NavBar and Office Navigation Bar Enhancements
Tasks.Description: Supports compact mode for NavBar and Office Navigation Bar. The Office Navigation Bar control needs to be docked to the NavBar control's bottom. Supports runtime resizing for the NavBar control.

Tasks.Caption: SVG Icons
Tasks.Description: Add support for vector images in SVG format.

Tasks.Caption: Scheduler Control - Agenda View
Tasks.Description: Chronologically displays a list of appointments while grouping by day.

Tasks.Caption: Scaffolding. Many-To-Many View
Tasks.Description: Create a view to edit entities with many-to-many relations.

Tasks.Caption: Clipboard Management Enhancements
Tasks.Description: The Copy Formatting feature allows end-users to copy the control's selection along with formatting settings (fonts, cell background and foreground) to the Clipboard in RTF, HTML and Biff8 (XLS) formats.

Tasks.Caption: Office Inspired Animations
Tasks.Description: Extend the animation capabilities for WinForms Controls with additional Office-inspired animation modes.

Tasks.Caption: App UI Manager - FreeLayout for WidgetView
Tasks.Description: Free Layout Mode imposes no restrictions on how to organize your widgets and allows you to build any desired layout. This is the only layout mode that fully supports floating widgets.

Tasks.Caption: Master-Detail Mode - Single Vertical Scrollbar for Multiple Views
Skin Performance and Memory Usage Optimization
New TreeMap Control
Tasks.Description: The new DevExpress WinForms TreeMap Control allows you to visualize flat or hierarchically structured data using nested rectangles that are sized and ordered by a quantitative variable.

Tasks.Caption: Design-Time improvements for all controls
Tasks.Description: Adapt DevExpress designers to support hi-resolution displays. Support the F1 shortcut for properties in the Designerâ€™s Properties window. The 'Learn more online' action should navigate to a help topic that describes the selected control/component.

Tasks.Caption: Stub Glyphs for BarItems in Ribbon & BarManager
Tasks.Description: Implement "stub" caption-based glyphs for items in Toolbars and Ribbon UI. Provide properties to customize colors, font attributes, text alignment, text case mode and background shape.

Tasks.Caption: Visual Studio Inspired Waiting Indicator
Tasks.Description: Implement a new VS-inspired waiting indicator for the ProgressPanel and TransitionManager components.
